creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: doughnut-shaped section with center of red fabric embellished with white rickrack; outer band of multicolored embroidered bands embellished with mirrors; multicolored tassels on one side; central diamond-shaped section embroidered in predominately orange on red with cross; trimmed in beads and multicolored tassels; gathered rounded section at opposite end with same multicolored embroidery and mirrors, beads and tassels; two black and metallic gold ties
medium: Cotton, mirrors, beads, metallic threads, plastic metallic trim
title: Headdress (?)
